# EvolutionBorg - Phase 3 (Late Game)
# Generated by: Opus 4.5
# Levels 35-50, Dungeon Depth 60-100
# Focus: Endgame preparation and calculated aggression

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = TRUE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = FALSE
borg_worships_mana = TRUE
borg_worships_ac = FALSE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = TRUE
borg_kills_uniques = TRUE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 100
borg_cheat_death = FALSE

# Rationale: Late game requires offense. Damage + speed kills
# Morgoth before summons overwhelm. Mana critical for casters.
# Risky play because endless retreating wastes consumables.
